description: This file defines a React component called OnboardingWizard, which implements a 3-step onboarding process with role selection, default species, and date range selection. It manages local state, interacts with authentication and filter context hooks, and renders a modal dialog for user onboarding.

methods.name: OnboardingWizard()
methods.description: Main React functional component implementing the onboarding wizard logic and UI.

methods.name: StepIndicator
methods.description: Internal component rendering step indicator dots to show the current step.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Advances to the next onboarding step, up to step 3.

methods.name: back
methods.description: Returns to the previous onboarding step, down to step 1.

methods.name: finish
methods.description: Completes onboarding by saving roles and preferences, applying filters, and navigating to dashboard.
